mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_BOARD WHERE BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT A.BOARD_CODE , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.BOARD_VIEWS , A.BOARD_POST_DATE , A.BOARD_DELETE_YN , A.USER_CODE , B.USER_NIKNAME FROM REVIEW_BOARD A JOIN USER_TABLE B ON(A.USER_CODE = B.USER_CODE) WHERE BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_POST_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{ start } AND #{ end } ORDER BY BOARD_POST_DATE DESC

SELECT A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_VIEWS , A.BOARD_POST_DATE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.BOARD_CODE , A.USER_CODE , B.USER_NIKNAME FROM REVIEW_BOARD A JOIN USER_TABLE B ON (B.USER_CODE = A.USER_CODE) WHERE A.BOARD_DELETE_YN = 'N' AND A.BOARD_CODE = #{ boardCode }
SELECT A.PICTURE_UTIL_PATH FROM PICTURE_TABLE A JOIN REVIEW_PICTURE_MANAGE B ON(B.PICTURE_CODE = A.PICTURE_CODE) WHERE B.BOARD_CODE = #{ boardCode }

SELECT D.USER_NIKNAME , A.REPLY_CONTENT , A.REPLY_DATE , A.REPLY_DELETE_YN , B.BOARD_CODE , A.REPLY_CODE , D.USER_CODE , A.REPORT_YN FROM REPLY_MANAGE A JOIN REVIEW_BOARD_REPLY B ON(B.REPLY_CODE = A.REPLY_CODE) JOIN REVIEW_BOARD C ON(C.BOARD_CODE = B.BOARD_CODE) JOIN USER_TABLE D ON(D.USER_CODE = B.USER_CODE) WHERE B.BOARD_CODE = #{ boardCode } ORDER BY A.REPLY_DATE ASC
